Q6: When Geordi gets his sight given to him by Riker, he says Tasha is as beautiful as he imagined. Do you think Geordi was in love with Tasha? If Denise hadn’t left, would this have been explored? @68shaubooker

Q5: What magical gifts would Riker have tried to give other Star Trek characters if they'd been there with him?

Q3: Should Riker have revived the girl who died?
Q2: What would you do to get into the "Penalty Box"? @TGParsons1701

Q3: Does the Omega Molecule need to be kept so secret? @StrTrk1701 #StarTrekHour
Q2: The Doctor recommends Seven reads 'A Christmas Carol' - why? What book would you recommend to the rest of the Voyager crew and why? @TrekkieRob #StarTrekHour

Put discussion questions here: https://t.co/cVl0N3vT83 https://t.co/HNHJShWUmF
Q7: How difficult was it seeing the Defiant be destroyed? Where does it rank among most painful and best effects/story for a starship destruction? @TrekkieRob #StarTrekHour
Q6: Do you feel guilty at all for cheering on Damar when he turns against the Dominion given his character’s history in the show? @ArckAngel_X #StarTrekHour
Q5: Why do you think the book of the Kosst Amojan was never destroyed? @christybell39 #StarTrekHour

Q4: O’Brien loses the Col. Travis figurine in this episode, finding it in the series finale during a poignant montage. Did you remember the callback in the finale to this moment? Did it hit the feels? @ArckAngel_X #StarTrekHour
Q3: Was Winn destined to commit evil or would she have been deterred off of that path if the Prophets spoke to or acknowledged her? @TrekkieRob #StarTrekHour
Q2: How much did the Dukat/Winn romance make you sick to your stomach? Despite, did you still love it? @ArckAngel_X #StarTrekHour
Q1: Martok says the Klingons never attacked Starfleet headquarters. Why? Surely their cloaks could have allowed them to? @TrekkieRob #StarTrekHour

Q8: Should repercussions-however minor or even humorous they could be-have shown up in following episodes? @ArckAngel_X #StarTrekHour
Q7: Is the incident completely Beverly's fault? Should she have felt more guilty? @ohmyspacesailor #StarTrekHour
Q6: Who scares you more… Venom-Worf or Spider-Broccoli? @realAceEbb #StarTrekHour

Q4: What would you de-evolve to? @crosis42 #StarTrekHour
Q3: I've seen this episode get bad reviews for the DNA science being too far-fetched. Do you agree? Do you like it anyway? :) @realAceEbb #StarTrekHour
Q2: Since counselor Troi evolved into an amphibian, does this also mean that Worf was an amphibian as well due to his strong sexual attraction to Deanna? @christybell39 #StarTrekHour
Q1: Because of Riker's memory loss, Starfleet isn't informed and no help is underway. Is the strict hierarchy on board a danger to the crew? @ohmyspacesailor #StarTrekHour
